column5: (ID Units:  SF: ) A well-known value 123.  Uniquely identifies this as a SunSpec Immediate Controls Model - Range: 123
(L Units: Registers SF: ) Length of Immediate Controls Model - Range: 24
(Conn_WinTms Units: Secs SF: ) Time window for connect/disconnect. - Range:
(Conn_RvrtTms Units: Secs SF: ) Timeout period for connect/disconnect. - Range:
(Conn Units:  SF: ) Enumerated valued.  Connection control. - Range: 0: Disconnected 1: Connected
(WMaxLimPct Units: % WMax SF: WMaxLimPct_SF) Set power output to specified level. - Range:
(WMaxLimPct_WinTms Units: Secs SF: ) Time window for power limit change. - Range: 0 - 300
(WMaxLimPct_RvrtTms Units: Secs SF: ) Timeout period for power limit. - Range: 0 - 28800
(WMaxLimPct_RmpTms Units: Secs SF: ) Ramp time for moving from current setpoint to new setpoint. - Range: Not supported
(WMaxLim_Ena Units:  SF: ) Enumerated valued.  Throttle enable/disable control. - Range: 0: Disabled 1: Enabled
(OutPFSet Units: cos() SF: OutPFSet_SF) Set power factor to specific value - cosine of angle. - Range:
(OutPFSet_WinTms Units: Secs SF: ) Time window for power factor change. - Range: 0 – 300
(OutPFSet_RvrtTms Units: Secs SF: ) Timeout period for power factor. - Range: 0 – 28800
(OutPFSet_RmpTms Units: Secs SF: ) Ramp time for moving from current setpoint to new setpoint. - Range: Not supported
(OutPFSet_Ena Units:  SF: ) Enumerated valued.  Fixed power factor enable/disable control. - Range: 0: Disabled 1: Enabled
(VArWMaxPct Units: % WMax SF: VArWMaxPct_SF) Reactive power in percent of I_WMax. - Range: Not supported
(VArMaxPct Units: % VArMax SF: VArPct_SF) Reactive power in percent of I_VArMax. - Range:
(VArAvalPct Units: % VArAval SF: VArPct_SF) Reactive power in percent of I_VArAval. - Range: Not supported
(VArPct_WinTms Units: Secs SF: ) Time window for VAR limit change. - Range: 0 – 300
(VArPct_RvrtTms Units: Secs SF: ) Timeout period for VAR limit. - Range: 0 – 28800
(VArPct_RmpTms Units: Secs SF: ) Ramp time for moving from current setpoint to new setpoint. - Range: Not supported
(VArPct_Mod Units:  SF: ) Enumerated value. VAR limit mode. - Range: 2: VAR limit as a % of VArMax
(VArPct_Ena Units:  SF: ) Enumerated valued.  Fixed VAR enable/disable control. - Range: 0: Disabled 1: Enabled
(WMaxLimPct_SF Units:  SF: ) Scale factor for power output percent. - Range: 0
(OutPFSet_SF Units:  SF: ) Scale factor for power factor. - Range: -3
(VArPct_SF Units:  SF: ) Scale factor for reactive power. - Range: 0
